ygData.subject: RE: RDragon splitting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hehe yes, which you answered in your reply to your own post. ... like jhenderson, i agree with you both here.  i wanted a ykesha as much as the next guy,
ygData.messageBody:
> Shada - Just out of curiosity, why aren't the instruments
> "bards before others"?
> Is that so obvious that it's assumed?

hehe yes, which you answered in your reply to your own post.

>
> Related topic:
> I've been in a lot of groups lately that seem to believe that
> drops should go to
> the player who can best utilize them, with lottos if there is
> some dispute over
> who would reap the most benefit. Not so curiously, they
> rarely seem to believe
> that a Bard can reap the most benefit from anything.

like jhenderson, i agree with you both here. i wanted a ykesha as much as
the next guy, and i can use it and more importantly WOULD use it. any group
just get the lotto rules before-hand so there are no surprises. the biggest
problem is the robes winning ykeshas and sashes. only two possiblities,
they're going to their twinks or getting traded. so i guess the 3 types of
lottos are everyone in, only those who can use, or those that can use it
best. just depends on what you're camping and what kind of group you are
in.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
